title: A video clip from a web series is being falsely shared as ‘Sadhu strangling a policeman brutally’
subtitle: The video shared as that of a sadhu strangling a policeman is not of a real-life incident. It is part of a web series on a YouTube channel (‘CWE’).
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video clip is being widely shared on social media claiming that a sadhu is strangling a policeman. But, FACTLY has found the video clip to be a part of a web series. The complete video can be seen on the YouTube channel of ‘CWE’ and was uploaded on 18 March 2019. ‘CWE’ is Continental Wrestling Entertainment channel started by WWE wrestler ‘The Great Khali’. So, the video clip is not that of a real-life incident and is a part of a web series of ‘CWE’. Earlier, when another clip of a web series of ‘CWE’ went viral as that of a true incident, FACTLY has debunked it and that fact-checked article can be read here.

Did you watch our new video?
